caption.p: Antigenotoxic properties of methanol extracts of H. officinalis subsp. aristatus (1E–6E) against DNA damage in human peripheral blood leukocytes, induced by hydrogen peroxide (H 2O 2) in post-treatment protocol. Bars represent the mean value of cells with DNA damage ± standard error of the mean (SEM) versus the control treated with H 2O 2 ( n = 3). PBS: phosphate-buffered saline solution. *** p < 0.0001.
